data.message: I identify myself as human... Not where I put my dick. Anyone that identifies themselves by their sexuality is a weak minded individual.

replies.message: No kidding! That's like me putting up a big banner saying straight pride banner in front of my home. Now that I think of it?.... Lol just kidding
Comments like this certainly are not going to make you any more admired lets not resort to this children also are reading these comments don't muddy the water.?
Sorry.  But if children are reading these comments, then their parents ought to be shot.  Children should not have access to adult machines without parental supervision.
Then adult shouldn't produce machines that are not good for the children...

if you people are talking about the "interested in" section, I bet MOST people don't even know what it is... they just put their own gender, that what I saw in most of my friends' profiles and I know their sexual preference.
